SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Appointment.description:
Simple read-only appointment data.
<para />
Carrier object for Appointment.
Services for the Appointment Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAppointmentAgent">Appointment Agent</see>.

Type.description: The different types of appointment, if the appointment is supposed to be shown in the diary or checklist, or if it's a document. See the different types of appointments in the database manual.

Task.description: Task comprises the different types of activities, like “Phone call”, “Meeting” and so on.

AssociateFullName.description: The owner of the appointment - the associate whose diary/checklist the appointment is in.

ContactName.description: The contact associated with the appointment.

Description.description: The appointment's textbox; holds a descriptive text about the appointment. Filled out by the user.

PersonFullName.description: The full name of the person this appointment belongs to.

PersonId.description: Person ID of person the appointment is with, may be 0

ContactId.description: Contact ID of owning contact, may be 0

ProjectId.description: ID of project referred to, may be 0

ProjectName.description: The name of the project this appointment belong to. Blank if no project is connected.

IsPublished.description: True if appointment have an entry in published table

AssociateId.description: ID of associate whose diary the appointment is in, REQUIRED

ColorIndex.description: Appointment colour, used only in Japanese versions. Western versions take colour from Task

IsFree.description: True if free, false if busy

HasAlarm.description: Does this appointment have an alarm

Private.description: Obsolete, but still maintained field for appointment privacy; denormalization of visiblefor status

TaskType.description: The different task types of the appointment, if the activity is an appointment, task, phone. See the different types of appointments in the database manual.

IsBookingMain.description: True if this appointment is a booking and current associate is the owner. False if it is a booking and current associate is a participant.

IsRecurrence.description: True if the appointment is part of a recurring pattern.

IsBooking.description: True if this appointment is a booking.

ActiveDate.description: The date to be used for searching & showing

AssignmentStatus.description: Status if this appointment is in the process of being assigned to someone else

InvitationStatus.description: Status if this appointment represents an invitation

BookingType.description: The type of booking the appointment represents

MotherId.description: ID of mother appointment; self if booking master, master ID if booking slave, 0 if normal appointment. However, if 0 and assoc_id != reg_id then this is an assigned appointment, indicated vt type = kBooking

AssignedBy.description: Who (last) assigned this appointment to associate_id?

AssignedByFullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

RejectReason.description: Why was this booking or assignment rejected, the RejectReason list is a source of suggestions but you can write anything here

Location.description: Location for appointment, defaulted from invited resource of type place and other rules, but you can write anything you want here

SaleName.description: Heading of Owning sale, if any. (may be blank)

CreatedBy.description: Who created the appointment. Associate name.

CreatedByFullName.description: Who created the appointment. Full name.

CreatedByAssociateId.description: Id of the associate that created the appointment

CautionWarning.description: Status field to indicate appointments that have some sort of problem

JoinVideomeetUrl.description: Blank when not a video meeting. Filled with Join Meeting URL when created.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.FieldInfoBase.description:
Abstract basic information about database fields. May be custom or user-defined fields. The information can be used to build a user interface.
<para />
Carrier object for FieldInfoBase.
Services for the FieldInfoBase Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserDefinedFieldInfoAgent">UserDefinedFieldInfo Agent</see>.

FieldType.description: What sort of data does this field contain. 1 = int, 2 = short text, ...

DisplayName.description: Label for field. May be multi-lang string encoded.

Description.description: Optional tooltip text for this field

ShortLabel.description: Short name to be used in Archive headings and on page 1. If blank, the fieldLabel will be used everywhere.

HideField.description: Hide the field from the UI. Only allow API access.

IsIndexed.description: Is this field indexed? 0 if no, index no. if yes

IsMandatory.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes (field must be filled out)

IsExternal.description: Should this field be shown to external users via customer center?

Rank.description: Tab order, ranking within the custom fields.

TemplateVariableName.description: Template variable name: 'cs01', 'cl02' etc. Null for extra fields.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.UserDefinedFiel.description:
Return information about the user defined fields. The information can be used to mirror the layout of the user-defined fields in the user interface.
<para />
Carrier object for UserDefinedFieldInfo.
Services for the UserDefinedFieldInfo Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserDefinedFieldInfoAgent">UserDefinedFieldInfo Agent</see>.

ColumnId.description: The ID of the database column this field corresponds to

FieldDefault.description: Optional default value for String fields

FieldType.description: Field type: 0 = leadtext only, 1 = Edit, 2 = CheckBox, 3 = dropdown, 4 = listbox

FormatMask.description: Formatting mask, can be whatever the controls understand (currently nothing :-))

IsIndexed.description: Is this field indexed? 0 if no, index no. if yes

LastVersionId.description: UDefFieldId this field had in the previous version, 0 = field is new in this version

ListTableId.description: The table ID of the source table for lists: kTableAssoc, kTableContInt or whatever

IsMandatory.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes (field must be filled out)

Type.description: ID of owning table (contact, person, project) - this is not the actual tableNumber, rather it's an enum

Page1LineNo.description: Line no on View Page 1, used if MDO flags are OFF. 0 = this field is not visible on page 1

ProgId.description: Programmatic ID, for use by software that needs to find a particular field. Carried over like udefIdentity across generations. Use a Company.Product.Field format to avoid naming conflicts; the Company name SuperOffice is reserved.

ShortLabel.description: Short name to be used in Archive headings and on page 1. If blank, the fieldLabel will be used everywhere.

TabOrder.description: Tab order value, sets the field processing sequence

TextLength.description: Length (in characters) of a text field, 0 for other types

Tooltip.description: Optional tooltip text for this field

UdefIdentity.description: Unique number used to track field identity across layout changes

UDListDefinitionId.description: List to use for populating dropdown or listbox

Version.description: Definition version number; ALL fields get new version whenever layout is updated.

HasBeenPublished.description: Has the udef field been published?

MdoListName.description: MDO list name used to populate this list. Derived from UDListDefinitionId and ListTableId. (Read-only)

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.AttachmentEntit.description:
The Attachment carrier represent meta data for a Service attachment
<para />
Carrier object for AttachmentEntity.
Services for the AttachmentEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ITicketAgent">Ticket Agent</see>.

ContentType.description: The content type for the attachment (e.g. &apos;applaction/octet-stream&apos; or &apos;application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document&apos;).

AttSize.description: The size (in bytes) for the attachment.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.TicketCar.description:
The Attachment carrier represent meta data for a Service attachment
<para />
AttachmentEntity entity with API _Links added.

ContentType.description: The content type for the attachment (e.g. &apos;applaction/octet-stream&apos; or &apos;application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document&apos;).

AttSize.description: The size (in bytes) for the attachment.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatSessionEnti.description:
Chat sessions belong to a chat topic, and contain messages to/from users
<para />
Carrier object for ChatSessionEntity.
Services for the ChatSessionEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

TopicId.description: The reference to the associated chat topic.

Person.description: Customer person in this session - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

CustomerHost.description: The hostname or IP address for the customer.

CustomerName.description: The name of customer, if provided

CustomerEmail.description: The email address of the customer, if provided

CustomerPhone.description: The phone number of the customer, if provided

CustomerConsented.description: The customer consented when starting the session

CustomerCompanyName.description: The name of the customers company, if provided

Status.description: Enum indicating the status for the session (pending, active, closed, etc).

FirstMessage.description: A copy of the first message in the chat session

LastMessage.description: A copy of the last message in the chat session

WhenRequested.description: When the session was requested by the customer.

WhenStarted.description: When the session was accepted by a user.

WhenIdle.description: The last time anyone sent a message for this session.

WhenFetched.description: The last time the customer&apos;s client refetched the data. Used to detect &apos;dead&apos; session.

SessionKey.description: Key used to authenticate the session.

InitialQueuePos.description: The initial queue pos (i.e. the number of pending sessions + 1) when the session was requested.

AlertLevel.description: The alert level for this chat session.

Rank.description: Lowest possible unique number for active sessions for user. User for color index. Starting at 1.

Flags.description: Various flags for the chat session

Contact.description: Contact this session is connected to - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

Project.description: Project the session is connectedto - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

Sale.description: Sale the session is connected to - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

Ticket.description: Ticket the session is connected to - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

TransferTo.description: User agent that has a pending transfer of the chat session

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Ticket.description:
The ticket carrier is used for representing a service request.
<para />
Carrier object for Ticket.
Services for the Ticket Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ITicketAgent">Ticket Agent</see>.

LastChanged.description: The last time the ticket was modified.

ReadByOwner.description: The datetime for when the ticket last was read by the owner.

ReadByCustomer.description: The datetime for when the ticket was read by the customer.

FirstReadByUser.description: The datetime for when the ticket first was read by a user.

Activate.description: When the ticket should be activated, if it is postponed.

RepliedAt.description: The datetime for when the ticket was replied to. I.e. the first external message added to the ticket.

AlertTimeout.description: The datetime for when the ticket should jump to the next alert_level.

CreatedBy.description: The id of the user who created the ticket. 1 (system user) if the ticket was created externally

CreatedByName.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

Author.description: A string representing the author of the ticket (same as author of first message).

OwnedBy.description: The id of the user who owns the ticket. 1 (system user) if the ticket is unassigned.

OwnedByName.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

Category.description: The id of the category a ticket is in.

CategoryName.description: The (short) name of this category. E.g. &apos;support&apos;.

CategoryFullname.description: The fullname (compiled from parents&apos; names) for this category. E.g. &apos;norway/product A/support&apos;.

Priority.description: The reference to the ticket_priority table.

BaseStatus.description: The status of the ticket. I.e. active/closed/postponed/deleted

Origin.description: What is the origin of this ticket

CustId.description: The reference to the customer. NULL or -1 if ticket is not connected to customer.

AlertLevel.description: The alert level for the ticket. Matches the level value of the ticket_alert table.

ConnectId.description: If a ticket is connected to another ticket, this field is set to the id of the &apos;master&apos; ticket.

ReadStatus.description: Whether the owner has read the ticket or not (red, yellow, green).

TimeToReply.description: The time (minutes) between when the ticket was created and when it was replied to. Calculated based on priority&apos;s timeframe.

RealTimeToReply.description: Same as time_to_reply, but not calculated based on priority.

TimeToClose.description: The time (minutes) between when the ticket was created and when it was closed. Calculated based on priority&apos;s timeframe.

RealTimeToClose.description: Same as time_to_close, but not calculated based on priority.

TimeSpentInternally.description: The total time (seconds) within the priority's office hours the ticket has been in an open status (configurable), not including current state

TimeSpentExternally.description: The total time (seconds) within the priority's office hours the ticket has been in a external waiting status (configurable), not including current state

TimeSpentQueue.description: The total time (seconds) within the priority's office hours the ticket has been in a queue status, not including current state

RealTimeSpentInternally.description: The total time (seconds) within 24x7 the ticket has been in an open status (configurable), not including current state

RealTimeSpentExternally.description: The total time (seconds) within 24x7 the ticket has been in a external waiting status (configurable), not including current state

RealTimeSpentQueue.description: The total time (seconds) within 24x7 hours the ticket has been in a queue status, not including current state

HasAttachment.description: Boolean indicating if this ticket has one or more attachments.

NumReplies.description: The number of replies (messages) to the customer for this request.

NumMessages.description: The total number of messages for this request.

FromAddress.description: The from-address used when this ticket got created, e.g. by email

CustFullname.description: Get the full name for the primary customer

TicketStatusDisplayValue.description: Get the display name of the ticket status.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ChatCarri.description:
Chat sessions belong to a chat topic, and contain messages to/from users
<para />
ChatSessionEntity entity with API _Links added.

TopicId.description: The reference to the associated chat topic.

Person.description: Customer person in this session - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

CustomerHost.description: The hostname or IP address for the customer.

CustomerName.description: The name of customer, if provided

CustomerEmail.description: The email address of the customer, if provided

CustomerPhone.description: The phone number of the customer, if provided

CustomerConsented.description: The customer consented when starting the session

CustomerCompanyName.description: The name of the customers company, if provided

Status.description: Enum indicating the status for the session (pending, active, closed, etc).

FirstMessage.description: A copy of the first message in the chat session

LastMessage.description: A copy of the last message in the chat session

WhenRequested.description: When the session was requested by the customer.

WhenStarted.description: When the session was accepted by a user.

WhenIdle.description: The last time anyone sent a message for this session.

WhenFetched.description: The last time the customer&apos;s client refetched the data. Used to detect &apos;dead&apos; session.

SessionKey.description: Key used to authenticate the session.

InitialQueuePos.description: The initial queue pos (i.e. the number of pending sessions + 1) when the session was requested.

AlertLevel.description: The alert level for this chat session.

Rank.description: Lowest possible unique number for active sessions for user. User for color index. Starting at 1.

Flags.description: Various flags for the chat session

Contact.description: Contact this session is connected to - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

Project.description: Project the session is connectedto - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

Sale.description: Sale the session is connected to - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

Ticket.description: Ticket the session is connected to - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

TransferTo.description: User agent that has a pending transfer of the chat session

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatMessage.description:
A message in a chat session
<para />
Carrier object for ChatMessage.
Services for the ChatMessage Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

ChatSessionId.description: The reference to the associated chat session.

Type.description: The type of the message.

ReadByCustomer.description: Whether the message has been read by the customer or not.

SpecialType.description: Enum indicating if it is a special message, such as an URL redirection, etc.

WhenPosted.description: When the message was posted (UTC timestamp).

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatTopicEntity.description:
Chat topics define who is assigned, when the channel is open for business, and look of the chat widget.
<para />
Carrier object for ChatTopicEntity.
Services for the ChatTopicEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

Name.description: The name of this chat topic

Description.description: The descriptiong for this topic.

WelcomeMessage.description: The welcome message sent to the customer when the chat session starts.

Language.description: Customer language used in this topic. Optional

LastAccept.description: The last time a session was accepted from the inside for this topic.

SecondsPrAccept.description: The average number of seconds per accept for this topic.

AlertRecipient.description: The recipient(s) for the alert template

BadgeHeader.description: The badge header of the chat topic

CustomQueueText.description: A text to be used in the queue message in the chat widget. Usage is controlled by the flags field, bit number 3

WarnNewChatSeconds.description: Contains the user notify time in seconds

WarnManagerNewChatSeconds.description: Contains the manager notify time in seconds

TicketEnabled.description: Enable ticket submission in offline mode

TicketCategory.description: Category on ticket created from off-line request

TicketPriority.description: Priority on ticket created from off-line request

OpeningHoursEnabled.description: Whether to use opening hours or not.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CustomerLanguag.description:
Customer languages that customer center supports.
<para />
Carrier object for CustomerLanguage.
Services for the CustomerLanguage Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ReplyTemplate.description:
Reply template item
<para />
Carrier object for ReplyTemplate.
Services for the ReplyTemplate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Name.description: The name for this reply template.

Description.description: The description for this reply template.

FolderId.description: The id of the folder in which this reply template is located. NULL or -1 if this is a toplevel reply template.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketCategory.description:
Ticket Category - light read-only version of TicketCategoryEntity.
<para />
Carrier object for TicketCategory.
Services for the TicketCategory Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketPriority.description:
Carrier object for TicketPriority.
Services for the TicketPriority Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatOpeningHour.description:
Chat Topic Opening Hours
<para />
Carrier object for ChatOpeningHours.
Services for the ChatOpeningHours Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

TzLocation.description: Timezone used for the opening hours (start/stop times) for this topic.

MonStart.description: When opening hours start on Mondays. Only time-part is used.

MonStop.description: When opening hours stop on Mondays. Only time-part is used.

TueStart.description: When opening hours start on Tuesdays. Only time-part is used.

TueStop.description: When opening hours stop on Tuesdays. Only time-part is used.

WedStart.description: When opening hours start on Wednesdays. Only time-part is used.

WedStop.description: When opening hours stop on Wednesday. Only time-part is used.

ThuStart.description: When opening hours start on Thursdays. Only time-part is used.

ThuStop.description: When opening hours stop on Thursdays. Only time-part is used.

FriStart.description: When opening hours start on Fridays. Only time-part is used.

FriStop.description: When opening hours stop on Fridays. Only time-part is used.

SatStart.description: When opening hours start on Saturdays. Only time-part is used.

SatStop.description: When opening hours stop on Saturdays. Only time-part is used.

SunStart.description: When opening hours start on Sundays. Only time-part is used.

SunStop.description: When opening hours stop on Sundays. Only time-part is used.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatWidgetSetti.description:
Defines the look of the chat widget.
<para />
Carrier object for ChatWidgetSettings.
Services for the ChatWidgetSettings Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

PreFormEnabled.description: Enable pre-chat form for anonymous users

PreFormMessage.description: Message to be shown in a pre-chat

RequiredFields.description: Fields required to start a chat

PostFormHeader.description: Header text to show in post chat form

PostFormMessage.description: Message text to show in post chat form

LanguageIsoCode.description: The language ISO code for the widget language

Theme.description: Predefined themes for the chat widget

Color.description: The base color of the widget

Font.description: The font used in the widget

ShowLogo.description: Indicates if the logo should be shown in the widget

ShowAgentPhoto.description: Use agent photo and name when chatting

WelcomeTitle.description: Short welcome message when user initiates a chat

WelcomeMessage.description: Short message displayed as long as the request is in queue or active

OfflineHeader.description: Offline text shown in widget header

OfflineFields.description: Required field when creating ticket in offline mode

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.KbCategory.description:
Knowledge base category. Groups knowledge base articles into hierarchy.
<para />
Carrier object for KbCategory.
Services for the KbCategory Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Description.description: The description of this category.

Fullname.description: The full name of this category, i.e. Foo/bar/test.

ParentId.description: This entry contains a reference to the parent category. NULL or -1 if this is a toplevel category.

SortOrder.description: A strictly ascending number used for sorting categories when they are listed.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ChatCarri.description:
Chat topics define who is assigned, when the channel is open for business, and look of the chat widget.
<para />
ChatTopicEntity entity with API _Links added.

Name.description: The name of this chat topic

Description.description: The descriptiong for this topic.

WelcomeMessage.description: The welcome message sent to the customer when the chat session starts.

Language.description: Customer language used in this topic. Optional

LastAccept.description: The last time a session was accepted from the inside for this topic.

SecondsPrAccept.description: The average number of seconds per accept for this topic.

AlertRecipient.description: The recipient(s) for the alert template

BadgeHeader.description: The badge header of the chat topic

CustomQueueText.description: A text to be used in the queue message in the chat widget. Usage is controlled by the flags field, bit number 3

WarnNewChatSeconds.description: Contains the user notify time in seconds

WarnManagerNewChatSeconds.description: Contains the manager notify time in seconds

TicketEnabled.description: Enable ticket submission in offline mode

TicketCategory.description: Category on ticket created from off-line request

TicketPriority.description: Priority on ticket created from off-line request

OpeningHoursEnabled.description: Whether to use opening hours or not.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.MDOListItem.description:
Carrier object for MDOListItem.
Services for the MDOListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMDOAgent">MDO Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: The deleted status of the ListItem

Type.description: The type of the ListItem. Custom field.

ChildItems.description: The child items of the MDOListItem

IconHint.description: The Icon hint of the ListItem. Custom field.

ColorBlock.description: The color indicator of the ListItem color block

ExtraInfo.description: Extra information added to the ListItem. Could be information such as sort order etc or other meta data. Custom field.

StyleHint.description: Style hint indicating, information such as background color etc. Custom field.

FullName.description: The name of the ListItem in its context

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatTopicAgent.description:
User agents within a chat topic. Which users are assigned and what roles they have within the chat topic.
<para />
Carrier object for ChatTopicAgent.
Services for the ChatTopicAgent Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

TopicId.description: The reference to the associated chat topic.

User.description: The associate that is the user agent.

CanListen.description: True of a user can listen in on this topic

CanRespond.description: True if the user can respond to chats in this topic

CanManage.description: True if the user is a manager for this topic

CanNotify.description: True if the user should receive notifications for this topic

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.BlobEntity.description:
Carrier object for BlobEntity.
Services for the BlobEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IBLOBAgent">BLOB Agent</see>.

BlobSize.description: The length, in bytes, of the binary data AS STORED after any encryption and/or zipping. Important to get right, since some databases will not tell us just based on the blob itself!

Description.description: A description that is entered by the user, and visible to the user

ExtraInfo.description: Extra information, spare field, can be used for anything that makes sense. Should not refer to any particular context, that is something for the BinaryObjectLInk

MimeType.description: Mime type, describing the technical type (image/jpeg) of the data

OriginalSize.description: Original size of the binary data, before encryption and/or zipping. This is what the ultimate client will get

CreatedBy.description: The person that first created the document. The property is read-only.

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated the appointment.

ConceptualType.description: The type, for instance PHOTO, PERSONPHOTO, or whatever, that is descriptive of what kind of image or data this is

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.description:
The Contact Service. The service implements all services working with the Contact object
<para />
Carrier object for ContactEntity.
Services for the ContactEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

Interests.description:
The contact's available and selected interests. 
<para>Use MDO List name "contint" to get list items.</para>

Description.description: Description of the contact. Usually shown as a postit note.

UpdatedBy.description: The user that last updated the contact

CreatedBy.description: The user that created the contact

Associate.description:
The user that owns this contact. 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Business.description:
The business that the contact is associated with. The GUI forces the user to enter a business type. 
<para>Use MDO List name "business" to get list items.</para>

Category.description:
The category that is set on the company. The GUI forces the user to enter a category type 
<para>Use MDO List name "category" to get list items.</para>

Country.description:
The country this contact is located in. The country a contact is saved with, affects the phone number format, and the address layout. 
<para>Use MDO List name "country" to get list items.</para>

Persons.description: The persons belonging to the contact.

NoMailing.description: Spam filter. Indicates if this contact should retrieve advertising.

Kananame.description: Contact kana name, used in Japanese versions only

GroupId.description: Group id of original owning associate, semantics like appnt.grp_id

ActiveStatusMonitorId.description: Active status monitor identity with the lowest rank for contact

SupportAssociate.description: <para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

TicketPriority.description: <para>Use MDO List name "ticketpriority" to get list items.</para>

Deleted.description: If nonzero, then this contact is 'deleted' and should generally not be shown

DbiKey.description: The primary key for the integrated entry in the external datasource.

DbiLastModified.description: When the entry was last modified.

Source.description: How did we get this contact? For future integration needs

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

BounceEmails.description: Email addresses with a positive bounce counter.

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.EntityElement.description:
Generic carrier object for entity elements such as Phone, EntityElement, Url. These elements do not have id and rank. These values are changed on each save, and should not be depended on. When used in a list or array the rank is the ascending list order.
<para />
Carrier object for EntityElement.

Value.description: The Element FullName.  This is a value that is intended to be shown to the user.

StrippedValue.description: The Element FullName.  This is a value that can be parsed and used by systems.

Description.description: The Element Description

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SelectableMDOLi.description:
Carrier object for SelectableMDOListItem.
Services for the SelectableMDOListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMDOAgent">MDO Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: The deleted status of the ListItem

Type.description: The type of the ListItem. Custom field.

ColorBlock.description: The color indicator of the ListItem color block

IconHint.description: The Icon hint of the ListItem. Custom field.

Selected.description: True if the ListItem is selected

ChildItems.description: The child items of the SelectableMDOListItem

ExtraInfo.description: Extra information added to the ListItem. Could be information such as sort order etc or other meta data. Custom field.

StyleHint.description: Style hint indicating, information such as background color etc. Custom field.

Hidden.description: True if the ListItem is hidden

FullName.description: The name of the ListItem in its context

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Business.description:
Carrier object for Business.
Services for the Business Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Category.description:
Carrier object for Category.
Services for the Category Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Country.description:
Carrier object for Country.
Services for the Country Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Name.description: Name of country in installed language

ImageDescription.description: Description of the country's flag image. (This is the country flag that is displayed in the CRM client)

DomesticAddressLayoutId.description: Domestic address layout of the country

ForeignAddressLayoutId.description: Foreign address layout of the country

Deleted.description: true if the country is deleted

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ContactCa.description:
The Contact Service. The service implements all services working with the Contact object
<para />
ContactEntity entity with API _Links added.

Interests.description:
The contact's available and selected interests. 
<para>Use MDO List name "contint" to get list items.</para>

Description.description: Description of the contact. Usually shown as a postit note.

UpdatedBy.description: The user that last updated the contact

CreatedBy.description: The user that created the contact

Associate.description:
The user that owns this contact. 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Business.description:
The business that the contact is associated with. The GUI forces the user to enter a business type. 
<para>Use MDO List name "business" to get list items.</para>

Category.description:
The category that is set on the company. The GUI forces the user to enter a category type 
<para>Use MDO List name "category" to get list items.</para>

Country.description:
The country this contact is located in. The country a contact is saved with, affects the phone number format, and the address layout. 
<para>Use MDO List name "country" to get list items.</para>

Persons.description: The persons belonging to the contact.

NoMailing.description: Spam filter. Indicates if this contact should retrieve advertising.

Kananame.description: Contact kana name, used in Japanese versions only

GroupId.description: Group id of original owning associate, semantics like appnt.grp_id

ActiveStatusMonitorId.description: Active status monitor identity with the lowest rank for contact

SupportAssociate.description: <para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

TicketPriority.description: <para>Use MDO List name "ticketpriority" to get list items.</para>

Deleted.description: If nonzero, then this contact is 'deleted' and should generally not be shown

DbiKey.description: The primary key for the integrated entry in the external datasource.

DbiLastModified.description: When the entry was last modified.

Source.description: How did we get this contact? For future integration needs

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

BounceEmails.description: Email addresses with a positive bounce counter.

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DuplicateRule.description:
Describes one duplicate rule to be used to find similar entries
<para />
Carrier object for DuplicateRule.

DisplayName.description: Short name of rule to display to user

IsActive.description: Indicating if a rule is current active, and should included in the duplicate detection

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DuplicateEntry.description:
A duplicate entry
<para />
Carrier object for DuplicateEntry.

SoPrimaryKey.description: Identity of an entry in the SuperOffice database. Should be 0 for matches from external systems.

EntryIdentifier.description: String identifier for entry. Typically used to identify an entry in an external system.

RuleDisplayName.description: Short name of rule to display to user

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactSummary.description:
Summary of contact with recent activities, chats, and requests included.
<para />
Carrier object for ContactSummary.
Services for the ContactSummary Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketSummaryIt.description:
The ticket summary with heading, created date.
<para />
Carrier object for TicketSummaryItem.
Services for the TicketSummaryItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ITicketAgent">Ticket Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ActivitySummary.description:
Summary details about appointments and documents.
<para />
Carrier object for ActivitySummaryItem.
Services for the ActivitySummaryItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAppointmentAgent">Appointment Agent</see>.

DocumentId.description: Document id - 0 if not a document

Description.description: The appointment's textbox; document title

Completed.description: The Completed state. NotStarted(1) or Completed(3)

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleSummaryItem.description:
Sale Summary item 
<para />
Carrier object for SaleSummaryItem.
Services for the SaleSummaryItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISaleAgent">Sale Agent</see>.

Probability.description: Probability of sale succeess in percent (0-100)

Currency.description: Currency the sale amount is in.

AmountInBaseCurrency.description: Sale amount converted to the base currency.

Status.description: The sale's status, indicating whether the sale is open(1), sold(2) or lost(3).

Completed.description: The Completed state. NotStarted(1) or Completed(3)

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatSummaryItem.description:
Chat session summary: id, title, created date
<para />
Carrier object for ChatSummaryItem.
Services for the ChatSummaryItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

Name.description: The name of customer, if provided

CompanyName.description: The name of the customers company, if provided

FirstMessage.description: A copy of the first message in the chat session

LastMessage.description: A copy of the last message in the chat session

WhenRequested.description: When the session was requested by the customer.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactRelation.description:
Relationship between a (contact/person) and another (contact/person), as described by the RelationDefinition.
<para />
Carrier object for ContactRelationEntity.
Services for the ContactRelationEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IRelationAgent">Relation Agent</see>.

SourceContactId.description: Id of the source contact. The value is mandatory.

SourcePersonId.description: Id of the source person. The value is not mandatory. The person must belong to the source contact.

DestinationContactId.description: Id of the destination contact. The value is mandatory.

DestinationPersonId.description: Id of the destination person. The value is not mandatory. The person must belong to the destination contact.

Reversed.description: Is direction reversed relative to definition

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.RelationC.description:
Relationship between a (contact/person) and another (contact/person), as described by the RelationDefinition.
<para />
ContactRelationEntity entity with API _Links added.

SourceContactId.description: Id of the source contact. The value is mandatory.

SourcePersonId.description: Id of the source person. The value is not mandatory. The person must belong to the source contact.

DestinationContactId.description: Id of the destination contact. The value is mandatory.

DestinationPersonId.description: Id of the destination person. The value is not mandatory. The person must belong to the destination contact.

Reversed.description: Is direction reversed relative to definition

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CRMScriptEntity.description:
CRM Scripts - stored in the ejScript table, including source code.
<para />
Carrier object for CRMScriptEntity.
Services for the CRMScriptEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICRMScriptAgent">CRMScript Agent</see>.

Description.description: Optional description of what this script is used for.

IncludeId.description: A unique name used for including this script in another

HierarchyId.description: The script is inside this hierarchy folder

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CRMScript.description:
CRM Scripts - stored in the ejScript table, including source code.
<para />
CRMScriptEntity entity with API _Links added.

Description.description: Optional description of what this script is used for.

IncludeId.description: A unique name used for including this script in another

HierarchyId.description: The script is inside this hierarchy folder

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CRMScriptResult.description:
Object for returning information when validating a CRMScript
<para />
Carrier object for CRMScriptResult.
Services for the CRMScriptResult Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICRMScriptAgent">CRMScript Agent</see>.

Valid.description: True if the CRMScript was successfully validated. If false, see the error message for details

ErrorMessage.description: Contains the error message for a non-valide CRMScript

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentEntity.description: Partial DocumentEntity class associating the generated DocumentEntity with an interface.

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated the appointment.

CreatedBy.description: The person that first created the document. The property is read-only.

OurRef.description: Our reference, searchable field from freetext search

Description.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

DocumentTemplate.description:
The template type of the document. 
<para>Use MDO List name "doctmpl" to get list items.</para>

Person.description:
A document may also be connected to a person; this must be a contact person registered on the current company. This does not mean however that a person is required. 
<para>Use MDO List name "person" to get list items.</para>

Associate.description:
The owner of the document - the associate whose checklist the document is in. 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Contact.description:
The contact associated with the document. It may also be null if no contact is associated with the document. 
<para>Use MDO List name "contact" to get list items.</para>

Project.description:
A document may also be connected to a project, so you see the document both on the company card, and on the project card. This does not mean however that a project is required. 
<para>Use MDO List name "project" to get list items.</para>

ExternalRef.description: External reference for document plugin to resolve document identity (Notes ID, e-mail message ID, whatever)

Completed.description: Document Completed state. This is the part of the Status property.

ActiveLinks.description: Number of active links to sale, document, appointment.

Type.description: Is this a normal document or a mail-merge or report?

Links.description: List of all elements linked to the document.

Sale.description:
A document may also be connected to a sale, so you see the document on the company card, on the project card and on the sale card. This does not mean however that a sale is required. May be null. 
<para>Use MDO List name "sale" to get list items.</para>

SuggestedDocumentId.description: Suggested guide item that this document is an instance of (Note: NOT valid for appointments, they have their own link)

Snum.description: The sequence number allocated from refcount on used template when creating the document

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentTemplat.description:
The template a document is based on is stored in the SO_arc\template folder on the server. This will return the name as displayed in the GUI, and not the physical document name, of the template the document object is based on.
<para />
Carrier object for DocumentTemplate.
Services for the DocumentTemplate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SaveInDb.description: 1 = save document records in DB; otherwise not.

DefaultOref.description: Processed via tag substitution to give document reference

RecordType.description: 1 = app, 2 = doc, 3 = email, 4 = fax, 5 = phone, 6 = todo - see EAppntRecordTypes

Deleted.description: 0 -> record is active 1 -> record is 'deleted' and should not be shown in lists

AutoeventId.description: Which document plugin is responsible for the documents generated from this template

QuoteDocType.description: What type of quote document is this.

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated the appointment.

CreatedBy.description: The person that first created the document. The property is read-only.

OurRef.description: Our reference, searchable field from freetext search

Description.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

DocumentTemplate.description:
The template type of the document. 
<para>Use MDO List name "doctmpl" to get list items.</para>

Person.description:
A document may also be connected to a person; this must be a contact person registered on the current company. This does not mean however that a person is required. 
<para>Use MDO List name "person" to get list items.</para>

Associate.description:
The owner of the document - the associate whose checklist the document is in. 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Contact.description:
The contact associated with the document. It may also be null if no contact is associated with the document. 
<para>Use MDO List name "contact" to get list items.</para>

Project.description:
A document may also be connected to a project, so you see the document both on the company card, and on the project card. This does not mean however that a project is required. 
<para>Use MDO List name "project" to get list items.</para>

ExternalRef.description: External reference for document plugin to resolve document identity (Notes ID, e-mail message ID, whatever)

Completed.description: Document Completed state. This is the part of the Status property.

ActiveLinks.description: Number of active links to sale, document, appointment.

Type.description: Is this a normal document or a mail-merge or report?

Links.description: List of all elements linked to the document.

Sale.description:
A document may also be connected to a sale, so you see the document on the company card, on the project card and on the sale card. This does not mean however that a sale is required. May be null. 
<para>Use MDO List name "sale" to get list items.</para>

SuggestedDocumentId.description: Suggested guide item that this document is an instance of (Note: NOT valid for appointments, they have their own link)

Snum.description: The sequence number allocated from refcount on used template when creating the document

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ForeignAppEntit.description:
Carrier object for ForeignAppEntity.
Services for the ForeignAppEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IForeignSystemAgent">ForeignSystem Agent</see>.

CreatedBy.description: The person that created the foreign application.

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated this foreign application.

Devices.description: The devices that belong to this foreign app.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ForeignDevice.description:
Saves a foreign device belonging to the ForeignDevice and application name specified.
<para />
Carrier object for ForeignDevice.
Services for the ForeignDevice Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IForeignSystemAgent">ForeignSystem Agent</see>.

AssociateFullName.description: The person owning the Foreign Device

CreatedBy.description: The person that created the device.

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated this device.

DeviceIdentifier.description: Optional unique id of device (Palm pilot device ID, etc)

CreatedBy.description: The person that created the foreign application.

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated this foreign application.

Devices.description: The devices that belong to this foreign app.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ForeignKey.description:
Carrier object for ForeignKey.
Services for the ForeignKey Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IForeignSystemAgent">ForeignSystem Agent</see>.

UpdatedBy.description: Name of the person that last updated the foreign key

CreatedBy.description: Name of the person that created the foreign key

TableName.description: Table name, transformed to and from numeric table id by the service layer

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.HierarchyEntity.description:
Folder structures
<para />
Carrier object for HierarchyEntity.
Services for the HierarchyEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Fullname.description: The full name of this category, i.e. Foo/bar/test.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ListCarri.description:
Folder structures
<para />
HierarchyEntity entity with API _Links added.

Fullname.description: The full name of this category, i.e. Foo/bar/test.

Mrmrs.description:
e.g. Mrs   sex_title 
<para>Use MDO List name "mrmrs" to get list items.</para>

BirthDate.description: The Person birth date as Date

CreatedBy.description: The user that created the person object

Emails.description: A collection of the person's emails

Description.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

IsAssociate.description: Checks if the person object is an associate. The property is read-only.

PrivatePhones.description: Returns a collection of phone numbers that belong to the contact person.

Faxes.description: Returns a collection of fax numbers that belong to the contact person.

MobilePhones.description: Returns a collection of mobile phone numbers that belong to the contact person.

OfficePhones.description: Returns a collection of office phone numbers that belong to the contact person.

OtherPhones.description: Returns a collection of pagers that belong to the contact person.

Position.description:
The position. This is a predefined SuperOffice value, different from Title 
<para>Use MDO List name "perspos" to get list items.</para>

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated the person object

Contact.description:
The contact the contact person is registered on. This is required unless the 'MandatoryContactOnPerson' preference is set. 
<para>Use MDO List name "contact_new" to get list items.</para>

Country.description:
The country this contact person is located in. 
<para>Use MDO List name "country" to get list items.</para>

Interests.description:
The person's available and selected interests. 
<para>Use MDO List name "persint" to get list items.</para>

FullName.description: The person's full name localized to the current culture/country.  (internal name used in clients for employees)

NoMailing.description: Spam filter. Indicates if this person should retrieve advertising.

UsePersonAddress.description: True if the person's address should be used as mailing address, instead of the contact's address.

Retired.description: True if the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

Urls.description: The urls related to this person.

FormalName.description: Get formal name for a person, as used in labels. (Full name + person title + academic title)

Address.description: Structure holding formatted address data. The layout of the array structure indicates the layout of the localized address.

Post3.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post2.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post1.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Kanalname.description: Kana last name, used in Japanese versions only

Kanafname.description: Kana first name, used in Japanese versions only

CorrespondingAssociate.description: The associate corresponding to this person. Will be empty if the person is not a user (internal associate user, external user).

Category.description:
Person's category. Usually null. Refer to the Contact.Category instead.  Intended for use when individual persons are created. (i.e. when Person.Contact is blank) 
<para>Use MDO List name "category" to get list items.</para>

Business.description:
Person's business - usually blank. Use Contact.Business instead. Intended for use when individual persons are created. (i.e. when Person.Contact is blank) 
<para>Use MDO List name "business" to get list items.</para>

Associate.description:
The associate owning this person (similar to contact.Associate) - usually blank. Use the Person.Contact.Associate instead.  Intended for use when individual persons are created (i.e. when Person.Contact is blank) 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Salutation.description:
Academic title, populated from Salutation list but can be overwritten with anything at all 
<para>Use MDO List name "salutation" to get list items.</para>

SupportAssociate.description: <para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

TicketPriority.description: <para>Use MDO List name "ticketpriority" to get list items.</para>

CustomerLanguage.description: <para>Use MDO List name "customerlanguage" to get list items.</para>

DbiKey.description: The primary key for the integrated entry in the external datasource.

DbiLastModified.description: When the entry was last modified.

SentInfo.description: Has information on username/password been sent (ejournal)

ShowContactTickets.description: Should tickets related to the company be shown to this person

UserInfo.description: Information about the user if this person is a user.  If IsAssociate (e.g. is user is true) the UserInfo will be provided.

Source.description: How did we get this person? For future integration needs

ActiveErpLinks.description: How many active ERP links are there for this person?

ShipmentTypes.description: The person's available and selected shipment types.

Consents.description: The person's available consent information. Missing consents are not deleted. To remove a consent, mark its legalbase as 'WITHDRAWN'

BounceEmails.description: Email addresses with a positive bounce counter.

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Position.description:
Carrier object for Position.
Services for the Position Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.UserInfo.description:
Carrier object for UserInfo.
Services for the UserInfo Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

UserName.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

UserGroupId.description: Primary group membership, see UserGroupLink for secondary memberships

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ConsentInfo.description:
Consent information for a give person. Consents are for a particular Purpose, and may be withdrawn (see LegalBase).
<para />
Carrier object for ConsentInfo.
Services for the ConsentInfo Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPersonAgent">Person Agent</see>.

Registered.description: When this consent record was created  in UTC.

RegisteredAssociateId.description: The ID of the associate who created this record

Updated.description: When this consent record was last updated  in UTC.

UpdatedAssociateId.description: The ID of the associate who last updated this record

LegalBaseId.description: Primary key for the LegalBase associated with this consent

LegalBaseKey.description: Key for the LegalBase associated with this consent

LegalBaseName.description: Name of the LegalBase associated with this consent

ConsentPurposeId.description: Primary key for the ConsentPurpose associated with this consent

ConsentPurposeKey.description: Key of the ConsentPurpose associated with this consent

ConsentPurposeName.description: Name of the ConsentPurpose associated with this consent

ConsentSourceId.description: Primary key for the ConsentSource associated with this consent

ConsentSourceKey.description: Key of the ConsentSource associated with this consent

ConsentSourceName.description: Name of the ConsentSource associated with this consent

CorrespondingAssociate.description: The associate corresponding to this person. Will be empty if the person is not a user (internal associate user, external user).

Category.description:
Person's category. Usually null. Refer to the Contact.Category instead.  Intended for use when individual persons are created. (i.e. when Person.Contact is blank) 
<para>Use MDO List name "category" to get list items.</para>

Business.description:
Person's business - usually blank. Use Contact.Business instead. Intended for use when individual persons are created. (i.e. when Person.Contact is blank) 
<para>Use MDO List name "business" to get list items.</para>

Associate.description:
The associate owning this person (similar to contact.Associate) - usually blank. Use the Person.Contact.Associate instead.  Intended for use when individual persons are created (i.e. when Person.Contact is blank) 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Salutation.description:
Academic title, populated from Salutation list but can be overwritten with anything at all 
<para>Use MDO List name "salutation" to get list items.</para>

SupportAssociate.description: <para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

TicketPriority.description: <para>Use MDO List name "ticketpriority" to get list items.</para>

CustomerLanguage.description: <para>Use MDO List name "customerlanguage" to get list items.</para>

DbiKey.description: The primary key for the integrated entry in the external datasource.

DbiLastModified.description: When the entry was last modified.

SentInfo.description: Has information on username/password been sent (ejournal)

ShowContactTickets.description: Should tickets related to the company be shown to this person

UserInfo.description: Information about the user if this person is a user.  If IsAssociate (e.g. is user is true) the UserInfo will be provided.

Source.description: How did we get this person? For future integration needs

ActiveErpLinks.description: How many active ERP links are there for this person?

ShipmentTypes.description: The person's available and selected shipment types.

Consents.description: The person's available consent information. Missing consents are not deleted. To remove a consent, mark its legalbase as 'WITHDRAWN'

BounceEmails.description: Email addresses with a positive bounce counter.

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonSummary.description:
Summary of person, with recent activities, chats, and requests included.
<para />
Carrier object for PersonSummary.
Services for the PersonSummary Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPersonAgent">Person Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ProjectEntity.description:
The Project Service. The service implements all services working with the Project object
<para />
Carrier object for ProjectEntity.
Services for the ProjectEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IProjectAgent">Project Agent</see>.

ProjectMembers.description: The persons which are members of the project

Description.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

Postit.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

CreatedBy.description: The person that created the project

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated the project

Associate.description:
The person that created the project 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

ProjectStatus.description:
Project status is a list defined by the database administrator. Different statuses of a project may be: “In planning”, “Started”, “Finished” and so on 
<para>Use MDO List name "projectstatus" to get list items.</para>

ProjectType.description:
Project type is a list defined by the database admin. for example: 'Large', 'Small', 'Party'... 
<para>Use MDO List name "projecttype" to get list items.</para>

HasImage.description: True if the project has an image. (This is the image that is displayed in the CRM client)

ImageDescription.description: Description of the project image if it exists. (This is the image that is displayed in the CRM client)

ActiveStatusMonitorId.description: Active status monitor identity with the lowest rank for project

Links.description: List of all elements linked to the project

ActiveLinks.description: Number of active links to documents, other appointments, and such

Completed.description: Done (0=false, 1=true). Status implies changes in which fields are shown in GUI, as well as which fields can be updated

NextMilestoneDate.description: Calculated date, reflects date of closest non-complete future milestone activity

NmdAppointmentId.description: ID of appointment that "caused" the nextMilestoneDate, can be 0

EndDate.description: Planned end date for project, inhertied from type and later editable

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ProjectEntity.CustomFields} instead.

CustomFields.description:

Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket.

combined collection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ProjectMember.description:
A person can be a member of multiple projects, with a different comment and member type in each project.
<para />
Carrier object for ProjectMember.
Services for the ProjectMember Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IProjectAgent">Project Agent</see>.

ContactId.description: Contact ID of person who is the project member

ProjectId.description: Parent project - the project this project member belongs to.

ProjectName.description: Name of the project this project member belongs to.

ProjectMemberTypeId.description:
ProjectMember Type Id - from the ProjectMemberType list. 
<para>Use MDO List name "PMembType" to get list items.</para>

Comment.description: Comment text on the project membership

FullName.description: The person's full name localized to the current culture/country.  (internal name used in clients for employees)

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.description: Partial SaleEntity class associating the generated SaleEntity with an interface.

Associate.description:
The sale owner 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

UpdatedBy.description: Who updated the sale

CreatedBy.description: Who created to sale

Contact.description:
The contact associated with the sale. It may also be 0 if no contact is associated with the sale. 
<para>Use MDO List name "contact" to get list items.</para>

Project.description:
A sale may also be connected to a project, so you see the sale both on the company card, and on the project card. This does not mean that a project is required. 
<para>Use MDO List name "project" to get list items.</para>

Person.description:
A sale may also be connected to a person - this must be a contact person registered on the current contact. This does not mean that a person is required. 
<para>Use MDO List name "person" to get list items.</para>

Currency.description:
The currency the sale object was sold in 
<para>Use MDO List name "currency" to get list items.</para>

Competitor.description:
List of all possible competitors.  
<para>Use MDO List name "comptr" to get list items.</para>

Credited.description:
List of who is to be credited for the sale. 
<para>Use MDO List name "credited" to get list items.</para>

Rating.description:
The sale rating 
<para>Use MDO List name "prob" to get list items.</para>

Reason.description:
The sale reason 
<para>Use MDO List name "reason" to get list items.</para>

Source.description:
The sale source 
<para>Use MDO List name "source" to get list items.</para>

Status.description: The state of the Sale: Open / Sold / Lost / Stalled

Probability.description: Actual probability, may differ from the one in the list

Completed.description: The Sale completed state. The completed state is either Started or Completed. NotStarted is treated as Started. The value maps to the Done database field.

ActiveLinks.description: Number of active links to sale, document, appointment.

Links.description: List of all elements linked to the sale.

NextDueDate.description: Next due date, this is a denormalization of 'closest future activity date, or most recent if no future activities'. Maintained by the system, but very convenient for searching.

Postit.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

SaleType.description: <para>Use MDO List name "saletype" to get list items.</para>

ReasonSold.description: <para>Use MDO List name "reasonsold" to get list items.</para>

ReasonStalled.description: <para>Use MDO List name "reasonstalled" to get list items.</para>

ReopenDate.description: Date the sale is to be reopened; valid only for status=stalled. Not necessarily the same as the nextDueDate.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.CustomFields} instead.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SelectionEntity.description:
Carrier object for SelectionEntity.
Services for the SelectionEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISelectionAgent">Selection Agent</see>.

Description.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

Postit.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

CreatedBy.description: Who created the selection

UpdatedBy.description: Who last modified the selection

SelectionCategory.description:
Selection category type (list item) 
<para>Use MDO List name "searchCat" to get list items.</para>

GroupIdx.description: Original primary user group of associate

IncludePerson.description: 0 = Include first person, 1 = Include all persons, 2 = Include no persons

MemberCount.description: How many selectionmembers (for progress bar calculations) - estimate, -1 (or 4294967295) means we don't know

SoundEx.description: What the name sounds like, for duplicate detection

Source.description: How did we get this selection? For future integration needs

UpdatedCount.description: Number of updates made to this record

Visibility.description: Obsolete, but still maintained denormalization of visiblefor

CompanyUnique.description: Filter out duplicate members based on company?

TargetTableNumber.description: TargetTableNumber defines the type of selection members this selection contains. e.g. the table number for 'contact', or 'project' or 'sale'

TargetTableName.description: TargetTableName contains the name of the table in lowercase. defines the type of selection members this selection contains. e.g. 'contact', or 'project' or 'sale'

LeftSelectionId.description: LeftSelectionId is used in combination with RightSelectionId and CombinationType to define an union of two selections when SelectionType=Combined.

RightSelectionId.description: RightSelectionId  is used in combination with LeftSelectionId and CombinationType to define an union of two selections when SelectionType=Combined.

SelectionUnionType.description: How to combine the two selections when SelectionType = Combined.

MainProviderName.description: The name of the Archive Provider that will deliver the content of the archive - the actual entity rows

ShadowProviderName.description: The name, if relevant, of the Archive Provider that will deliver the Shadow rows: contact/person rows related to the actual entity. Can be blank, indicating that there is no shadow archive

ChartKey.description: ID/key of the last-used chart tile on this selection

LastLoaded.description: The date/time this selection was last loaded (selectionentity fetched)

LastLoadedByAssociate.description: Associate that last looked at the selection members; only date (not time) is valid

LastMembershipChange.description: The date/time the membership the selection last changed. Dynamic: change of criteria; Static: add/remove members; Combined: change of algorithm

LastMembershipChangeByAssociate.description: Associate that last changed the selection membership (static members, dynamic criteria, combined parameters); only date (not time) is valid

MainHeading.description: 'Static selection of Companies', or whatever else is appropriate, made by combining text resources for the type and the entity (plural form); this string will contain resource references

MemberTabHeading.description: 'Companies', or whatever else is appropriate - the plural form of the entity name; this string will contain resource references

MailingsProviderName.description: The name of the provider for the Mailings tab, if relevant; this string will contain resource references

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

MainHeading.description: 'Static selection of Companies', or whatever else is appropriate, made by combining text resources for the type and the entity (plural form); this string will contain resource references

MemberTabHeading.description: 'Companies', or whatever else is appropriate - the plural form of the entity name; this string will contain resource references

MailingsProviderName.description: The name of the provider for the Mailings tab, if relevant; this string will contain resource references

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactPersonId.description:
Class representing an ContactPersonId carrier used for storing either a person id or a contact id. If PersonId contains an id, ContactId will be 0, and the other way around.
<para />
Carrier object for ContactPersonId.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ShipmentMessage.description:
This entity contains information about design blocks that can be used in a shipment/mailing message
<para />
Carrier object for ShipmentMessageBlockEntity.
Services for the ShipmentMessageBlockEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMarketingAgent">Marketing Agent</see>.

AssociateId.description: The associate that owns this block

Block.description: The block definition. Normally this will be a json structure

UpdatedCount.description: Number of updates made to this record

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Marketing.description:
This entity contains information about design blocks that can be used in a shipment/mailing message
<para />
