Block.description: The block definition. Normally this will be a json structure

UpdatedCount.description: Number of updates made to this record

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ShipmentMessage.description:
A shipment message, that contains the actual message being sent out in a mailing
<para />
Carrier object for ShipmentMessageEntity.
Services for the ShipmentMessageEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMarketingAgent">Marketing Agent</see>.

PlainMessage.description: Plain message text of this message

HtmlMessage.description: HTML formatted text of this message

Description.description: Describes this message

Subject.description: The mail subject field of the message

FolderId.description: The folder which this message belongs to. -1 indicates that the message is on the root

HeaderField.description: Extra header fields added to mail. Must be formatted correctly

Design.description: Will contain the design part of a message. The format will vary based on the type of designer used to create the message

Designtype.description: Enum containing the type of the design

Flags.description: Identifies if HTML or plain message is included in message.

LongDescription.description: A field for a long description of this template

DocumentMessage.description: The SM document used as template for this mailing

UpdatedCount.description: Number of updates made to this record

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SystemEventEnti.description:
Entity for system events
<para />
Carrier object for SystemEventEntity.
Services for the SystemEventEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="!:IConfigurationAgent">Configuration Agent</see>.

Eta.description: Estimated Time of Arrival, i.e., when will this event finish?

Eventmess.description: Message to be shown, entered by administrator

ExtraInfo.description: Extra information (area id for prototype rebuild, etc)

UpdatedCount.description: Number of updates made to this record

ActivatedBy.description: The associate that first created the SystemEvent.

Entity for system events
<para />
SystemEventEntity entity with API _Links added.

Eta.description: Estimated Time of Arrival, i.e., when will this event finish?

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketEntity.description:
The ticket entity is used for representing a service ticket
<para />
Carrier object for TicketEntity.
Services for the TicketEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ITicketAgent">Ticket Agent</see>.

LastChanged.description: The last time the ticket was modified.

ReadByOwner.description: The datetime for when the ticket last was read by the owner.

ReadByCustomer.description: The datetime for when the ticket was read by the customer.

FirstReadByUser.description: The datetime for when the ticket first was read by a user.

Activate.description: When the ticket should be activated, if it is postponed.

RepliedAt.description: The datetime for when the ticket was replied to. I.e. the first external message added to the ticket.

AlertTimeout.description: The datetime for when the ticket should jump to the next alert_level.

CreatedBy.description: The associate who created this ticket

Author.description: A string representing the author of the ticket (same as author of first message).

OwnedBy.description:
The associate who owns this ticket 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Category.description:
The ticket category entity which this ticket is connected to 
<para>Use MDO List name "ejcategory" to get list items.</para>

Priority.description:
The ticket priority entity which this ticket is connected to 
<para>Use MDO List name "ticketpriority" to get list items.</para>

BaseStatus.description:
The status of the ticket. I.e. active/closed/postponed/deleted 
<para>Use MDO List name "ticketstatus" to get list items.</para>

Status.description:
The ticket status entity which this ticket is connected to 
<para>Use MDO List name "ticketstatus" to get list items.</para>

Origin.description: What is the origin of this ticket

Person.description:
The primary person that this ticket is connected to 
<para>Use MDO List name "person_new" to get list items.</para>

SecondaryPersons.description:
The secondary persons this ticket is connected to 
<para>Use MDO List name "person_new" to get list items.</para>

AlertLevel.description: The alert level for the ticket. Matches the level value of the ticket_alert table.

ConnectId.description: If a ticket is connected to another ticket, this field is set to the id of the &apos;master&apos; ticket.

ReadStatus.description: Whether the owner has read the ticket or not (red, yellow, green).

TimeToReply.description: The time (minutes) between when the ticket was created and when it was replied to. Calculated based on priority&apos;s timeframe.

RealTimeToReply.description: Same as time_to_reply, but not calculated based on priority.

TimeToClose.description: The time (minutes) between when the ticket was created and when it was closed. Calculated based on priority&apos;s timeframe.

RealTimeToClose.description: Same as time_to_close, but not calculated based on priority.

TimeSpentInternally.description: The total time (seconds) within the priority's office hours the ticket has been in an open status (configurable), not including current state

TimeSpentExternally.description: The total time (seconds) within the priority's office hours the ticket has been in a external waiting status (configurable), not including current state

TimeSpentQueue.description: The total time (seconds) within the priority's office hours the ticket has been in a queue status, not including current state

RealTimeSpentInternally.description: The total time (seconds) within 24x7 the ticket has been in an open status (configurable), not including current state

RealTimeSpentExternally.description: The total time (seconds) within 24x7 the ticket has been in a external waiting status (configurable), not including current state

RealTimeSpentQueue.description: The total time (seconds) within 24x7 hours the ticket has been in a queue status, not including current state

HasAttachment.description: Boolean indicating if this ticket has one or more attachments.

NumReplies.description: The number of replies (messages) to the customer for this request.

NumMessages.description: The total number of messages for this request.

FromAddress.description: The from-address used when this ticket got created, e.g. by email

Messages.description: TicketMessageId,CreatedAt,SLevel and Important for all the messages connected to this ticket. For message body see the TicketMessageEntity or the TicketMessage archive.

Tags.description: An array containing the tags assigned to this request

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketCategoryE.description:
This entity describes the meta data for a ticket category, and provides special operations on it.
<para />
Carrier object for TicketCategoryEntity.
Services for the TicketCategoryEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

TicketCategoryId.description: The id of the ticket category. (primary key)

ParentId.description: The parent category for this category. -1 if this is a toplevel category.

Name.description: The (short) name of this category. E.g. &apos;support&apos;.

Fullname.description: The fullname (compiled from parents&apos; names) for this category. E.g. &apos;norway/product A/support&apos;.

CategoryMaster.description: The user associated with this category.

Flags.description: A bitmask representing flags for this category.

DelegateMethod.description: An integer indicating the delegation method for this category.

ExternalName.description: The external name for this category, used for the customer frontend.

ClosingStatus.description: An integer indicating if new requests should have the &apos;close request&apos; in this category checked as default, or if the users preferences should be selected.

MsgClosingStatus.description: An integer indicating if new messages should have the &apos;close request&apos; in this category checked as default, or if the users preferences should be selected.

AssignmentLag.description: Number of minutes we shall override the assignment if a customer sends consecutive messages to this category

ReplyTemplate.description: Reply template to merge with messages posted in this category

NotificationEmail.description: Comma separated list of addresses to notify when requests are redelegated to (unassigned) in this category.

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketCategoryEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketCategoryEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketPriorityE.description:
Entity for a ticket priority. This entity describes the meta data for a ticket priority, and provides special operations on it.
<para />
Carrier object for TicketPriorityEntity.
Services for the TicketPriorityEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SortOrder.description: Indicates the sort order for this priority. 1 is first, 100 is last

TicketRead.description: This field indicates what to do with the escalation chain when the request is read

ChangedOwner.description: This field indicates what to do with the escalation chain when the request changes owner (manually)

TicketNewinfo.description: This field indicates what to do with the escalation chain when the request gets new info

TicketClosed.description: This field indicates what to do with the escalation chain when the request is closed

TicketChangedPriority.description: This field indicates what to do with the escalation chain when the request is changed into this priority

TicketNew.description: This field indicates what to do with the escalation chain when a new request is registered

MonStart.description: The work hour start for Mondays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

MonStop.description: The work hour sstop for Mondays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

TueStart.description: The work hour start for Tuesdays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

TueStop.description: The work hour stop for Tuesdays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

WedStart.description: The work hour start for Wednesdays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

WedStop.description: The work hour stop for Wednesdays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

ThuStart.description: The work hour start for Thursdays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

ThuStop.description: The work hour stop for Thursdays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

FriStart.description: The work hour start for Fridays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

FriStop.description: The work hour stop for Fridays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

SatStart.description: The work hour start for Saturdays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

SatStop.description: The work hour stop for Saturdays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

SunStart.description: The work hour start for Sundays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

SunStop.description: The work hour stop for Sundays. Note that only the time part of the DateTime is used

NonDates.description: Dates which the escalation time should not be running. Note that only the day of the year (day and month) is used. So the year and time part is not used even if this is a DateTime

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketStatusEnt.description:
Entity for a ticket status. This entity describes the meta data for a ticket status, and provides special operations on it.
<para />
Carrier object for TicketStatusEntity.
Services for the TicketStatusEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Name.description: Name of user defined ticket status

TimeCounter.description: Which field in ticket we count time spent on (queue, internal, external)

NoEmailReopen.description: Whether inbound emails can reopen requests with this status or not

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketMessage.description:
The TicketMessage carrier is used for representing a service ticket message
<para />
Carrier object for TicketMessage.
Services for the TicketMessage Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ITicketAgent">Ticket Agent</see>.

Important.description: If this message is important or not.

Services for the Tag Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketMessageEn.description:
The ticket messages are e-mails, SMS or other messages attached to a ticket (aka request).
<para />
Carrier object for TicketMessageEntity.
Services for the TicketMessageEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ITicketAgent">Ticket Agent</see>.

CreatedBy.description: The associate who created this ticket message

Author.description: A string representing the author of the message. Could be a user&apos;s name, or a persons email address.

Type.description: The type of the message (plaintext/html).

MessageId.description: The X-Message-Id header value from the email. Used for threading, i.e. connecting messages to existing tickets.

TimeSpent.description: The time spent (minutes) for this message.

HtmlBody.description: The html body for the message (if any).

EmailHeader.description: The email header is saved in this field as raw text

DebugInfo.description: The debug info for the message.

MailSorter.description: The name of the mail sorter used when the email was imported. Note: We must use name instead of id since the id&apos;s change every time one changes the mail sorter. :-0

MessageCategory.description: Defines what kind of message this is.

Person.description:
If this is an incoming message, this will contain the person 
<para>Use MDO List name "person_new" to get list items.</para>

SearchTitle.description: A copy of the title of the ticket, for search optimisation and simpler reporting.

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketMessageEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TriggerScriptEn.description:
CRM Trigger Script - The script runs when a given event fires.
<para />
Carrier object for TriggerScriptEntity.
Services for the TriggerScriptEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICRMScriptAgent">CRMScript Agent</see>.

Name.description: Optional description of what this script is used for.

ScreenType.description: Event id that triggers script.  See EventHandlerType enum.

Enabled.description: Whether this screen chooser is enabled or not

Source.description: The CRMscript code for this event handler

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CRMScript.description:
CRM Trigger Script - The script runs when a given event fires.
<para />
TriggerScriptEntity entity with API _Links added.

Name.description: Optional description of what this script is used for.

ScreenType.description: Event id that triggers script.  See EventHandlerType enum.

Enabled.description: Whether this screen chooser is enabled or not

Source.description: The CRMscript code for this event handler

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.BatchTaskInfo.description:
BatchTaskInfo contains information about one batch task.
<para />
Carrier object for BatchTaskInfo.
Services for the BatchTaskInfo Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IBatchAgent">Batch Agent</see>.

AssociateId.description: Task owner. If it is a System task, AssociateId = 0.

DetailsTable.description: Id of table with more information about the task.

DetailsRecord.description: Record Id of a row in the DetailsTable containing more info about the task.

IsSystemTask.description: If IsSystemTask is true, the task is not initiated by an associate.

IsInternalTask.description: If IsInternalTask is true, this task will not add a trace to the database.

ParameterObject.description: ParameterObject will be serialized to a binary blob and saved in the BinaryObject table. The link to the BinaryObject will be set using DetailsTable and DetailsRecord.

LastStarted.description: When was the task last started.

StartCount.description: Maps to the startcount field in the batchtask table.

DatabaseSerialNumber.description: Serial number of the database the task is to run on.

Result.description: Maps to the result field in the batchtask table.

Description.description: Description of the task.

Response.description: Maps to the response field in the batchtask table.

Request.description: Maps to the request field in the batchtask table.

ProgressDescription.description: Descriptive text for the current stage

ProgressPercent.description: Task progress, in percent of estimated total

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatPresence.description:
Represents presence information for a chat user, bundled with some other useful information
<para />
Carrier object for ChatPresence.
Services for the ChatPresence Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

UserId.description: The id for the chat user

DisplayName.description: The display name of the chat user

OngoingChats.description: The number of ongoing chats this users has now

Present.description: Indicates if the user has the chat presence turned on or off

ChatTopics.description: An array of ids with chat topics that this user is a member of

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Dashboard.description:
Dashboard configuration
<para />
Carrier object for Dashboard.
Services for the Dashboard Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDashboardAgent">Dashboard Agent</see>.

AssociateId.description: Id of the associate who owns this dashboard

Layout.description: The dashboard layout, how the tiles are organized on the screen

Tiles.description: The tiles associated with this dashboard

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DashboardTile.description:
Dashboard Tile configuration
<para />
Carrier object for DashboardTile.
Services for the DashboardTile Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDashboardAgent">Dashboard Agent</see>.

Description.description: The tile description

IsDefault.description: True if this is one of the default tiles

AssociateId.description: Id of the associate who owns this tile

GroupId.description: Id of the associates primary group at storage time

SelectionId.description: The selection that defines the data filter/restrictions

Type.description: The tile type, what kind of tile this is

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DashboardTileOp.description:
Dashboard Tile option
<para />
Carrier object for DashboardTileOption.
Services for the DashboardTileOption Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDashboardAgent">Dashboard Agent</see>.

Name.description: Name of option, usually not visible to users

Description.description: Option description, visible to users

Type.description: The type of option - integer, list, boolean (checkbox) etc.

ListName.description: An MDO list name, used if the type is list and no ListOptions are given

ListItems.description: List options given directly, not via MDO list name

Value.description: The value, encoded as string, Id:Name of list item if type is list

DefaultDataOption.description: True if this option only applies to the default data source, not selections

GroupId.description: Id of the associates primary group at storage time

SelectionId.description: The selection that defines the data filter/restrictions

Type.description: The tile type, what kind of tile this is

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.LicenseResult.description:
Carrier object for LicenseResult.
Services for the LicenseResult Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ILicenseAgent">License Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.LicenseOwner.description:
Carrier object for LicenseOwner.
Services for the LicenseOwner Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ILicenseAgent">License Agent</see>.

Name.description: The name of the license owner

UnrestrictedModuleLicenses.description: The unrestricted module licenses that this license owner

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ModuleLicenseLi.description:
Carrier object for ModuleLicenseLink.
Services for the ModuleLicenseLink Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ILicenseAgent">License Agent</see>.

Unrestricted.description: Is this module license restricted or unrestricted

Total.description: The total number of module licenses. In other words the number of free license added to the number of licenses in use equals the total number of licenses

Tooltip.description: The tooltip to be shown in some gui with details on the module license

CanAssign.description: Can a specific user assign this module license

Free.description: The number of licenses that are free to be assigned

InUse.description: The total number of licenses (of a given license module) that are occupied

Assigned.description: Is the module license assigned to a given user

ModuleLicenseId.description: The identifier of the module license

Name.description: The name of the module license

Description.description: The description of the module license

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Preference.description:
One preference item, which contains a specification (section/key), the raw string value, and the level at which this value was found.
<para />
Carrier object for Preference.
Services for the Preference Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

Level.description: Preference level, using the standard enumerated type. Undefined is returned for preferences that do not have a current setting.

Specification.description: Preference specification, consisting of the section name and key name

DisplayValue.description: Display value, populated when asked for. Suitable for binding display-datasource in lists, etc. Formatted using CultureDataFormatter.

DisplayTooltip.description: Display tooltip, populated when asked for. Suitable for binding display-datasource in lists, etc. Formatted using CultureDataFormatter.

DisplayType.description: Display type, populated when asked for.

TargetId.description: The id of the target row. The table it points at is specified by the preference type.

PrefDescId.description: The id of the prefdesc this preference is connected to

TableName.description: For DisplayType=PrefDescValueType.ListTableRef, TableName will contain the name of the table which the value reference to.

UserPreferenceId.description: The id of the user preference

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PreferenceSpec.description:
Preference specification, consisting of the section name and key name
<para />
Carrier object for PreferenceSpec.
Services for the PreferenceSpec Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TabOrder.description:
Carrier object for TabOrder.
Services for the TabOrder Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

AssociateId.description: Associate who owns this tab order

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PreferenceDescr.description:
Preference description, drives the Preference GUI. Maintenance client - controls all preferences in SuperOffice.
<para />
Carrier object for PreferenceDescription.
Services for the PreferenceDescription Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

ValueType.description: 1=number, 2=text, 3=bool, 4=list of values; 5=list table ref; 6=contact ID, 7=Person ID, 8=Project ID, 9=Selection ID

MaxLevel.description: Lowest allowed setting level, set by user, but not lower than sysMaxLevel

SysMaxLevel.description: Lowest allowed setting level, set by SuperOffice

Description.description: Description of preference, multi-language parsed

IsBuiltin.description: 1 = This row populated and maintained by SuperOffice

TableName.description: If valueType = 5, then TableName contains the table referenced by the preference

UserDefinedListId.description: Read-only field, If valueType = 5, and TableName is UDList, then UserdefinedLIstId contains the id of the list referenced by the preference

Rank.description: Rank field for ordering sections, and keys within sections

SubGroup.description: Keys that share a value (including NULL) in this field are shown together; a visual spacer is shown between groups

MinLevel.description: The minimum (furthest away from User) level this preference can be set for

MaxValue.description: Max value (if type 1); list table ID (if type 5)

MinValue.description: Min value (if type 1); list extra id (if type 5)

RequiredLicense.description: Licenses the user/installation must have if this reference is to be shown. Comma-separated list of owner.module pairs

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Preferenc.description:
Preference description, drives the Preference GUI. Maintenance client - controls all preferences in SuperOffice.
<para />
PreferenceDescription entity with API _Links added.

ValueType.description: 1=number, 2=text, 3=bool, 4=list of values; 5=list table ref; 6=contact ID, 7=Person ID, 8=Project ID, 9=Selection ID

MaxLevel.description: Lowest allowed setting level, set by user, but not lower than sysMaxLevel

SysMaxLevel.description: Lowest allowed setting level, set by SuperOffice

Description.description: Description of preference, multi-language parsed

IsBuiltin.description: 1 = This row populated and maintained by SuperOffice

TableName.description: If valueType = 5, then TableName contains the table referenced by the preference

UserDefinedListId.description: Read-only field, If valueType = 5, and TableName is UDList, then UserdefinedLIstId contains the id of the list referenced by the preference

Rank.description: Rank field for ordering sections, and keys within sections

SubGroup.description: Keys that share a value (including NULL) in this field are shown together; a visual spacer is shown between groups

MinLevel.description: The minimum (furthest away from User) level this preference can be set for

MaxValue.description: Max value (if type 1); list table ID (if type 5)

MinValue.description: Min value (if type 1); list extra id (if type 5)

RequiredLicense.description: Licenses the user/installation must have if this reference is to be shown. Comma-separated list of owner.module pairs

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Product.description:
Information about a Product from the ERP system. This may be fetched from SuperOffice Product table through the SO Connector
<para />
Carrier object for Product.
Services for the Product Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IQuoteAgent">Quote Agent</see>.

ERPProductKey.description: Reference/foreign key to the product in the given pricelist in the product supplier system, if it exists there.

ERPPriceListKey.description: Foreign key to the price list that this product is a part of, or the primary key of the pricelist if this is a built-in pricelist.

Name.description: The name to use in the user interface.

Description.description: The description to use, with potentially several lines. Will be used as tool-tip to use in the list user interface too.

Code.description: The product code / article number in the product supplier system.

PriceUnit.description: What is the unit (meter, ton, bushel, microsecond, gradus, τρυβλίον, 五合枡, دونم or whatever); read-only for lines that originate in defined products

QuantityUnit.description: What is the unit (meter, ton, bushel, microsecond, gradus, τρυβλίον, 五合枡, دونم or whatever); Connector handles conversion relative to PriceUnit if they are different

IsSubscription.description: Is this a subscription product, sold in repeating intervals/amounts?

SubscriptionUnit.description: Either a List id to an id from a connector provided list, or, if the connection doesn’t support lists, a text with the actual subscription unit.

DefaultSubscriptionQuantity.description: The default number of SubscriptionUnits to suggest when creating quote lines from this product

ItemNumber.description: Line item number, NOR: «Postnummer». Specific numbers from some hierarchy, for instance “1.4.3.2P”. Typically used to sort the items in the quote by some standard way.

Url.description: URL to product information web page.

ProductCategoryKey.description: Either a List id to an id from a connector provided list, or, if the connection doesn’t support lists, a text with the actual product category.

ProductFamilyKey.description: Either a List id to an id from a connector provided list, or, if the connection doesn't support lists, a text with the actual product family.

ProductTypeKey.description: Either a List id to an id from a connector provided list, or, if the connection doesn’t support lists, a text with the actual product type.

VAT.description: Tax/VAT if available from ERP system. THIS IS A PERCENTAGE. In the Superoffice product register, this field is available in the product admin GUI.

VATInfo.description: A field for putting VATInfo you need to show in the final quoteDocument, like the VAT type that is used. Not used in any business logic in SuperOffice; available to document templates.

UnitCost.description: The cost price. Might not be given, use Decimal.MinValue to signal this.

UnitMinimumPrice.description: The minimum price this salesman can offer to his customer. This might be cost price if there is no policy. Might not be given, use Decimal.MinValue to signal this.

UnitListPrice.description: (Basic Price, normal price, standard price.) This is the basic price from which the discount is computed from. The ListPrice will stay the same even when a larger amount is ordered.

InAssortment.description: True for products that should currently be offered, false when the product is discontinued and should not ordinarily be offered. When false the product no longer appears in search results.

Supplier.description: In SuperOffice, an id from the contact table, when saved as an ERP cache, the name of the supplier

SupplierCode.description: Suppliers part code/number or other key-like field

Rights.description: Field1=right&Field2=right, etc. of any fields that have non-standard field access rights. Rights can be one of: N (=None or Hidden), R (=Read-only), W (=Writeable), M (=Mandatory). The fields will mostly be from the Quoteline table, but some added fields that are conceptually part of the quoteline, like Image will also be possibly to set rights on. Will be used by SuperOffice to control the user interface when showing the record.

Rule.description: The names of one or more calculation rules that are in effect for this line, comma-separated case-insensitive. Will NOT be used by SuperOffice.

ExtraInfo.description: Extra information, supplied by QuoteConnector, used by a future dynamic GUI extension

RawExtraInfo.description: Read-only extra information in plain text, supplied by QuoteConnector, used by a future dynamic GUI extension

ExtraField1.description: This a simple field for adding information that the Connector can provide, and that the qoute document need to display.

ExtraField2.description: This a simple field for adding information that the Connector can provide, and that the qoute document need to display.

ExtraField3.description: This a simple field for adding information that the Connector can provide, and that the qoute document need to display.

ExtraField4.description: This a simple field for adding information that the Connector can provide, and that the qoute document need to display.

ExtraField5.description: This a simple field for adding information that the Connector can provide, and that the qoute document need to display.

InStock.description: Negative numbers will be interpreted as how many is ordered. Might not be available.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ProductExtraDat.description:
A way to show some simple extra data on a product, typically to hep the user to identify the correct product. Basically a bucket of additional info that the ERP system would like to store and show in the user interface. Information placed here is shown in the GUI if the “provide-extra-data” capability is true.
<para />
Carrier object for ProductExtraDataField.
Services for the ProductExtraDataField Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IQuoteAgent">Quote Agent</see>.

Value.description: Value for the field. If type is string, it can contain formatspecifiers (use this for displaying numbers correctly as the user's computer is set up).

Type.description: String, url, image. How the value should be interpreted.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ProjectCa.description:
A person can be a member of multiple projects, with a different comment and member type in each project.
<para />
ProjectMember entity with API _Links added.

ContactId.description: Contact ID of person who is the project member

ProjectId.description: Parent project - the project this project member belongs to.

ProjectName.description: Name of the project this project member belongs to.

ProjectMemberTypeId.description:
ProjectMember Type Id - from the ProjectMemberType list. 
<para>Use MDO List name "PMembType" to get list items.</para>

Comment.description: Comment text on the project membership

FullName.description: The person's full name localized to the current culture/country.  (internal name used in clients for employees)

StakeholderRoleId.description: Stakeholde role list id - Primary key

ContactId.description: Contact ID of person or contact who is the sale stakeholder

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Script.description:
The Script Service. The service implements all services working with the CRMScript object.
<para />
Carrier object for Script.
Services for the Script Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICRMScriptAgent">CRMScript Agent</see>.

Description.description: Optional description of what this script is used for.

IncludeId.description: A unique name used for including this script in another

UpdatedBy.description: Who updated this script

Path.description: Path to script in the hierarchy.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TableRecord.description:
The extra table entity contains meta data for an extra table (not implemented yet)
<para />
Carrier object for TableRecord.
Services for the TableRecord Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDatabaseTableAgent">DatabaseTable Agent</see>.

Values.description: Values for the row, where the first string is the column name (e.g. x_number), and the second string is the value formatted as a DB-value, e.g. [I:42]

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.User.description:
SuperOffice User, with login credentials and an associated person.
<para />
Carrier object for User.
Services for the User Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

Name.description: Initials, UserId - also used as login name for on-site installations. Identifies user in archives.

LicenseOwners.description: The restricted and unrestricted module licenses grouped by license owner. These module licenses are either assigned or unassigned to this user

Role.description: Users role for role-based security. Determines permissions and access rights for the user.

UserGroup.description:
The main user group that this user belongs to. 
<para>Use MDO List name "usergroup" to get list items.</para>

OtherGroups.description:
The other groups this user is a member of, apart from the main user group. 
<para>Use MDO List name "usergroup" to get list items.</para>

Person.description:
The person associated with this user. Detailed information about the user 
<para>Use MDO List name "person_new" to get list items.</para>

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

Type.description: User type: 1=InternalAssociate, 2=ResourceAssociate, 3=ExternalAssociate, 4=AnonymousAssociate, 5=SystemAssociate

IsPersonRetired.description: True if the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

IsOnTravel.description: True if the user is on travel.

Credentials.description: List of credentials registered for this user. i.e. valid authentication methods.

UserName.description: User name, a.k.a. Login name. This might be an e-mail address.

TicketCategories.description:
Request Ticket Categories assigned to the user.  
<para>Use MDO List name "ejCategory" to get list items.</para>

NickName.description: The unique nick name for this user. Used in Service as an alias, similar to Name/Initials.

WaitingForApproval.description: The user is waiting for an administrator to approve/grant her/him access.

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.User.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.User.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

PostSaveCommands.description: Post custom commands the client should execute after save has completed.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Role.description:
Users role for role-based security
<para />
Carrier object for Role.
Services for the Role Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.UserGroup.description:
The main user group that this user belongs to
<para />
Carrier object for UserGroup.
Services for the UserGroup Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: Deleted equal to true means that this is a user group that no longer can be selected by the user.  It is not permitted to delete a UserGroup.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Credential.description:
Credentials supported for authentication
<para />
Carrier object for Credential.
Services for the Credential Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

Type.description: Description of credential type

Value.description: This is the actuall value of the credentials.  This will typically be the password or teh users SID in active directory

DisplayValue.description: The value displayed to the user. this will typically be the users login name in active directory.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CustomCommand.description:
Generic carrier object for entity commands.
<para />
Carrier object for CustomCommand.

DisplayName.description: The name to show in GUI

Description.description: Description of the command.

ToolTip.description: Tooltip to be used in the GUI

Actions.description: The actions to call when invoked

ActionData.description: The data to be used when the command is invoked

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CredentialType.description:
Description of credential type
<para />
Carrier object for CredentialType.
Services for the CredentialType Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

DisplayType.description: The name of the credentials to be displayed in the user interface.  This will typically be Password for user-name/password scenarios and Active Directoru User for AD integration.

Type.description: Type of credentials, corresponding to name of plugin and type in the credentials table

Description.description: Description of the authentication type.  This value is used in a list of authentication providers that can be choosen by an end user and should be a fairly describtive text.  This will typically be SuperOffice is responsible for username and password for a password scenario.

ValueControl.description: Type of control used to display the value.

<para />
User entity with API _Links added.

NickName.description: The unique nick name for this user. Used in Service as an alias, similar to Name/Initials.

WaitingForApproval.description: The user is waiting for an administrator to approve/grant her/him access.

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.User.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CommandResult.description:
Generic carrier object for entity commands.
<para />
Carrier object for CommandResult.

Message.description: Message which should be displayed in GUI.

Result.description: The result used in this action.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Webhook.description:
Webhook definitions. Webhooks broadcast events from NetServer to remote servers.
<para />
Carrier object for Webhook.
Services for the Webhook Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IWebhookAgent">Webhook Agent</see>.

WebhookId.description: Primary Key. Unique id for this webhook.

Name.description: Name to identify this webhook. Does not have to be unique.

Events.description: Array of event names that trigger this webhook: ['contact.created', 'sale.changed']

TargetUrl.description: Destination to POST event info to. URL for webhooks. Id for CRM scripts

Secret.description: Shared secret key used for generating SHA256 HMAC signature, so that receiver can verify that call came from this server

State.description: Webhook status - should we post events to the URL? 1=Active, 2=Stopped or 3=TooManyErrors

Type.description: Name of plugin that handles this webhook. 'webhook' for webhooks, which are handled by the system plugin.

Headers.description: Custom HTTP Headers to add to webhook requests.

Properties.description: Custom values to inject into JSON body of webhook call.

RegisteredAssociate.description: The user that created the webhook.

UpdatedAssociate.description: The user that last updated the webhook.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.WebhookCa.description:
Webhook definitions. Webhooks broadcast events from NetServer to remote servers.
<para />
Webhook entity with API _Links added.

WebhookId.description: Primary Key. Unique id for this webhook.

Name.description: Name to identify this webhook. Does not have to be unique.

Events.description: Array of event names that trigger this webhook: ['contact.created', 'sale.changed']

TargetUrl.description: Destination to POST event info to. URL for webhooks. Id for CRM scripts

Secret.description: Shared secret key used for generating SHA256 HMAC signature, so that receiver can verify that call came from this server

State.description: Webhook status - should we post events to the URL? 1=Active, 2=Stopped or 3=TooManyErrors

Type.description: Name of plugin that handles this webhook. 'webhook' for webhooks, which are handled by the system plugin.

Headers.description: Custom HTTP Headers to add to webhook requests.

Properties.description: Custom values to inject into JSON body of webhook call.

RegisteredAssociate.description: The user that created the webhook.

UpdatedAssociate.description: The user that last updated the webhook.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.WebhookResult.description:
Result of calling a webhook
<para />
Carrier object for WebhookResult.
Services for the WebhookResult Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IWebhookAgent">Webhook Agent</see>.

Success.description: Was call to webhook successful? (200 OK)

Message.description: Headers and body of response from webhook

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ListEntity.description:
The list entity contains information about a specific list
<para />
Carrier object for ListEntity.
Services for the ListEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: True if the list item is marked as deleted

IsCustomList.description: Indicates if this is a custom list or a standard list

IsMDOList.description: Indicates if this is a MDO list

UseGroupsAndHeadings.description: Indicates if this list should use groups and headings

ListType.description: The type of this list, often indicated by the database name, but not necessarily

InUseByUserDefinedFields.description: True if this in use by one or more udfields

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ListCarri.description:
The list entity contains information about a specific list
<para />
ListEntity entity with API _Links added.

Deleted.description: True if the list item is marked as deleted

IsCustomList.description: Indicates if this is a custom list or a standard list

IsMDOList.description: Indicates if this is a MDO list

UseGroupsAndHeadings.description: Indicates if this list should use groups and headings

ListType.description: The type of this list, often indicated by the database name, but not necessarily

InUseByUserDefinedFields.description: True if this in use by one or more udfields

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ListItemEntity.description:
The list item entity contains generic list item information
<para />
Carrier object for ListItemEntity.
Services for the ListItemEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Id.description: The identity of the list item

Name.description: The name of the list item

Tooltip.description: The tooltip of the list item

Deleted.description: True if the list item is marked as deleted

UdListDefinitionId.description: The id of the list which this list item belongs to

Rank.description: The rank of the list item

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.HeadingEntity.description:
The heading entity contains generic list item information
<para />
Carrier object for HeadingEntity.
Services for the HeadingEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: True if the heading is marked as deleted

UdListDefinitionId.description: The id of the list which this heading belongs to

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.WebPanelEntity.description:
The web panel entity contains information on a web panel
<para />
Carrier object for WebPanelEntity.
Services for the WebPanelEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

WebPanelId.description: The identity of the web panel

Name.description: The name of the web panel

Tooltip.description: The tooltip of the web panel

Deleted.description: True if the web panel is marked as deleted

Rank.description: The rank of the web panel

OnCentral.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on central database

OnSatellite.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on a satellite

OnTravel.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on travel

OnSalesMarketingWeb.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on web client

OnSalesMarketingPocket.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on pocket client

ShowInMenuBar.description: Does the webpanel have a menu bar

ShowInToolBar.description: Does the webpanel have a toolbar

ShowInAddressBar.description: Does the webpanel have an address bar

ShowInStatusBar.description: Does the webpanel have a status bar

WindowName.description: The window which the URL address is to open in (webpanel only)

ProgId.description: String key that can be used to uniquely retrieve the panel; particularly useful for partners and others who do not wish to store database ID's

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ConsentPurpose.description:
Carrier object for ConsentPurpose.
Services for the ConsentPurpose Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

ConsentText.description: Form text used for the actual checkbox

FormText.description: Text for the consent form, the long text to be shown when asking the end-user for this kind of consent

Key.description: The key used to refer to this purpose, like #Process, #Emarketing etc.

Active.description: Is the consent purpose active or not

UpdatedDate.description: The date the consent purpose was last updated  in UTC.

UpdatedBy.description: The associate that last updated the consent purpose

Deleted.description: true if the ConsentPurpose is deleted

PrivacyStatementDesc.description: Name or description for the privacy statement

PrivacyStatementUrl.description: Url referencing the actual privacy statement

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ConsentSource.description:
Carrier object for ConsentSource.
Services for the ConsentSource Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Key.description: The key used to uniquely identify this consent source

MailTemplateId.description: The mail template to use when automatically sending emails to new persons created with this consent source.

Deleted.description: true if the ConsentSource is deleted

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CurrencyEntity.description:
Carrier object for CurrencyEntity.
Services for the CurrencyEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: 0 -> record is active 1 -> record is 'deleted' and should not be shown in lists

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentTemplat.description:
The template a document is based on is stored in the SO_arc\template folder on the server. This will return the name as displayed in the GUI, and not the physical document name, of the template the document object is based on.
<para />
Carrier object for DocumentTemplateEntity.
Services for the DocumentTemplateEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SaveInDb.description: 1 = save document records in DB; otherwise not.

Filename.description: Relative to TemplatePath, or extref for other document plugins. i.e URL or full path.

DefaultOref.description: Processed via tag substitution to give document reference

RecordType.description: 1 = app, 2 = doc, 3 = email, 4 = fax, 5 = phone, 6 = todo - see EAppntRecordTypes

Deleted.description: True if deleted

AutoeventId.description: Which document plugin is responsible for the documents generated from this template

IntentId.description: What is the intention of this document (used by SAINT)

LoadTemplateFromPlugin.description: Which document plugin is responsible for this template's contents

IsInUseInGuides.description: True if the template is in use in a project or sales guide

DocumentTypeKey.description: The document type to use when creating a blank document. Plugin-specific. Used when not creating template from a local file.

QuoteDocType.description: The role this document plays in the Quote system, if any

PrivacyDocType.description: Indicator that this document template has a functional role, related to privacy/GDPR

EmailSubject.description: Subject to use if document template is an email.

IncludeSignature.description: True if the email signature should be added in bottom of mail if this an email template

ShowCurrents.description: True if when using this template there should be shown a place for editing current choices of person, compant, sale, project etc

SenderEmailMode.description: If email template, when DocType is Privacy or quote email, it is possible to make sender address like our contact, or our support contact, or always one address

SenderEmailAddress.description: If email template, default senderaddress when template is of type quote email or privacy email.

InvitationDocType.description: Type for sending email meeting invitation. Not an invitation type template = 0, New = 1, Changed = 2, Cancelled = 3

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.LegalBase.description:
Carrier object for LegalBase.
Services for the LegalBase Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Key.description: The key used to uniquely identify this legal base

Deleted.description: true if the LegalBase is deleted

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PriceList.description:
A pricelist is basically a collection of products. It can be valid in a time period, and outright deactivated. All prices in the product list is in a specific currency. We have decieded not to separate prices and products, which means that we get a simpler data model, but some redundancy.
<para />
Carrier object for PriceList.
Services for the PriceList Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IQuoteAgent">Quote Agent</see>.

ERPPriceListKey.description: The key that uniquely identifies this pricelist in the ERP system

QuoteConnectionId.description: (Reserved for future use) The connection to the ERP system used for this pricelist

Name.description: Name of this pricelist to use in the user interface.

Description.description: Description of this pricelist , will be used as tool-tip in the user interface.

Currency.description: The iso currency code, like 'USD' or 'NOK'.

CurrencyName.description: The name to use in the user interface, like perhaps 'US dollar' or '$'

ValidFrom.description: The date (inclusive) the pricelist start to be valid. This can be DateTime.MinValue to signal that it doesn't have a specific start date.

ValidTo.description: The date (inclusive) the pricelist ends to be valid. This can be DateTime.MaxValue to signal that it doesn't have a specific end date.

IsActive.description: Is the list active (as opposed to being worked on, suddenly canceled, etc.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.QuoteCarr.description:
A pricelist is basically a collection of products. It can be valid in a time period, and outright deactivated. All prices in the product list is in a specific currency. We have decieded not to separate prices and products, which means that we get a simpler data model, but some redundancy.
<para />
PriceList entity with API _Links added.
